Recap: Nora and Eli both try to get Cole a light sentence for assaulting Todd. But the judge wants to throw the book at him and appears like Todd might have paid him off. Tea talks to Blair about what it's going to be when she is dying. Blair tells her she wants to help her even though they've never been friends. Starr goes and talks to Todd and admits that she believes that Hannah is lying to say she saw him push Marty. But she's torn when John informs her that it looks like Todd paid off the judge who that he puts Cole away. At the high school, a new boy wants Destiny to go to prom with him. But she has Matthew on the brain. He has Dani on the brain. She has Nate on her mind but notices another girl asked Nate.
